passthrough_vars.description: > Click the plus sign to add a new entry

snowplow__conversions_source.title: Conversions Source
snowplow__conversions_source.longDescription: The source (schema and table) of your conversion events, likely your atomic events table.

snowplow__page_views_source.title: Page Views Source
snowplow__page_views_source.longDescription: The source (schema and table) of the derived `snowplow_web_page_views` table.

snowplow__web_user_mapping_table.title: Web User Mapping Table
snowplow__web_user_mapping_table.description: Schema and table name of the snowplow web user mapping table
snowplow__web_user_mapping_table.longDescription: The schema and table name of the snowplow web user mapping table, if different to default.

snowplow__conversions_source_filter.title: Conversions Source Filter
snowplow__conversions_source_filter.longDescription: A timestamp field the conversion source field is partitioned on (ideally) for optimized filtering, when left blank `derived_tstamp` is used.

snowplow__conversions_source_filter_buff.title: Conversions Source Filter Buffer Days
snowplow__conversions_source_filter_buff.longDescription: The number of days to extend the filter.

snowplow__conversion_window_start_date.title: Conversion Window Start Date
snowplow__conversion_window_start_date.longDescription: The start date in UTC for the window of conversions to include.

snowplow__conversion_window_end_date.title: Conversion Window End Date
snowplow__conversion_window_end_date.longDescription: The end date in UTC for the window of conversions to include.

snowplow__conversion_window_days.title: Conversion Window Days
snowplow__conversion_window_days.longDescription: The last complete nth number of days (calculated from the last processed pageview within page_views_source) to dynamically update the conversion_window_start_date and end_date with. Will only apply if both variables are left as an empty string.

snowplow__path_lookback_days.title: Path Lookback Days
snowplow__path_lookback_days.longDescription: Restricts the model to marketing channels within this many days of the conversion (values of 30, 14 or 7 are recommended).

snowplow__path_lookback_steps.title: Path Lookback Steps
snowplow__path_lookback_steps.longDescription: The limit for the number of marketing channels to look at before the conversion.

snowplow__path_transforms.description: > Click the plus sign to add a new entry
snowplow__path_transforms.title: Path Transforms
snowplow__path_transforms.longDescription: Dictionary of path transforms (and their argument, `null` if none) to perform on the full conversion path (see [udfs.sql file](https://github.com/snowplow/dbt-snowplow-fractribution/blob/main/macros/path_transformations/create_udfs.sql)).

snowplow__use_snowplow_web_user_mapping_.title: Use Snowplow Web User Mapping Table
snowplow__use_snowplow_web_user_mapping_.longDescription: `true` if you are using the Snowplow web model for web user mappings (`domain_userid` => `user_id`)

snowplow__channels_to_exclude.description: > Click the plus sign to add a new entry
snowplow__channels_to_exclude.title: Channels to Exclude
snowplow__channels_to_exclude.longDescription: List of channels to exclude from analysis (empty to keep all channels). For example, users may want to exclude the `Direct` channel from the analysis.

snowplow__channels_to_include.description: > Click the plus sign to add a new entry
snowplow__channels_to_include.title: Channels to Include
snowplow__channels_to_include.longDescription: List of channels to include in the analysis (empty to keep all channels). For example, users may want to include the `Direct` channel only in the analysis.

snowplow__conversion_hosts.description: > Click the plus sign to add a new entry
snowplow__conversion_hosts.title: URL Hosts
snowplow__conversion_hosts.longDescription: `url_hosts` to filter to in the data processing

snowplow__consider_intrasession_channels.longDescription: If `false`, only considers the channel at the start of the session (i.e. first page view). If `true`, considers multiple channels in the conversion session as well as historically.
snowplow__consider_intrasession_channels.title: Consider Intrasession Channels

snowplow__run_python_script_in_snowpark.title: (Snowflake) Run Python Script in Snowpark
snowplow__run_python_script_in_snowpark.longDescription: A flag for if you wish to run the python scripts using Snowpark.

snowplow__attribution_model_for_snowpark.title: (Snowflake) Attribution Model for Snowpark
snowplow__attribution_model_for_snowpark.longDescription: The attribution model to use when running in Snowpark; one of `shapley`, `first_touch`, `last_touch`, `position_based`, `linear`. See the [package docs](/docs/modeling-your-data/modeling-your-data-with-dbt/dbt-models/dbt-fractribution-data-model/#attribution-models) for more information.
